resources.string: Opps!!! \n No Ringtones Yet, Create your new exciting ringtones!!!

Select desired prefix 
Enter your name or any message 
Select desired postfix 
Select language 
Set proper volume 
and click play
What if I don\'t want any prefix or postfix?
If you dont\'t want any prefix or postfix select none option.
My language is not changing when I select any other except English?
To change language you need to change the language of your keyboard.
To enable save button you need to atleast enter some text and play it once
I am not able to set tone as ringtone, notification tone or alarm tone
To set any tone as ringtone, notification tone or alarm tone you need to first save it with proper name
Like ringtone, notification tone and alarm tone is not set directly
When you set as notification tone or alarm tone it is added in the list \nTo set it you need to manually go to settings and change your notification tone and alarm tone
